name: Arica's Green Beans and Feta
author: Nicole
summary: Fresh side dish with feta cheese as an accent flavor.
ingredients: 2 teaspoons olive oil, or as needed
1 tablespoon minced garlic, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 pound green beans, cut into 1-inch pieces
directions: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat
Stir red bell pepper and garlic into hot oil; season with salt and black pepper
Cook and stir until the bell pepper is tender, 5 to 7 minutes
Stir green beans with the red bell pepper
Pour white wine over the green bean mixture
Place a cover on the skillet and cook until the green beans are tender, about 10 minutes
Sprinkle feta cheese over the mixture
Replace cover and continue cooking until the feta softens, about 3 minutes
